dc:title: Remembrance of Things Past
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reviews Evelyn Waugh's A Little Learning. Praises his autobiography for its candor and gives a brief history of his life.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 122 1965-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
